Articles.Content:
Hey all!

First post to the KSP forums. I've had the game for a while but just recently jumped back in. I'm involved in the Reddit community over at www.reddit.com/r/kerbalspaceporgram.

Just thought i would stop by and say hi as it's my first post.

- Spragoo
Hi Spragoo. I poke around on Kerbal Reddit sometimes, too. But his forum is more active, and I like the format better. Anyway, welcome to the official forum.
Welcome (back) aboard! We're glad to have you on the wonderful forums finally!

Hello there, new person. Or alien. Robot, maybe?

Well, whatever you are, I hope you like the forums!

I think Siri has finally become self aware!
